translations: adj.狂热的；热情洋溢的；酒神赞歌的

sentences.sentence: The former inhabitant of the Canary Isles continued his dithyrambic.
sentences.translation: 从前的加那利群岛居民继续喝着酒。

sentences.sentence: When the curtain of night fall down soundless, when the mountain and water disappear from your eyes, when to the end of the dithyrambic evening.
sentences.translation: 当夜幕无声得落下，将一切远山近水从你的视野里抹去的时候，当热闹的晚会结束。

sentences.sentence: Epic poetry and Tragedy, Comedy also and Dithyrambic poetry, and the music of the flute and of the lyre in most of their forms, are all in their general conception modes of imitation.
sentences.translation: 史诗和悲剧，喜剧也和Dithyrambic诗歌，以及音乐和长笛的表格的竖琴，是在模仿模式的一般概念。
